entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
